org.contentmine.norma.pubstyle.stylesheet

Class PublisherSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.contentmine.norma.pubstyle.stylesheet.PublisherSelector

  • public class PublisherSelector
extends java.lang.Object
    selects a publisher ffrom a stylesheet typical stylesheet contents The Royal Society 10.1098 meta[ (@name='DC.Publisher' and .='The Royal Society') or (@name='DC.Identifier' and contains(.,'10.1098/')) ]
    Author:
    pm286
